III. DESCRIPTION OF FINDINGS
1.) The facility is in compliance with all licensing rules and statutes:
2.) The facility is in compliance will all additional ISEP requirements.
3.) The facility is in compliance will all additional MDDHS Contract/Policy requirements.
EVALUATION OF RENEWAL PERIOD
Dolores Hall (former capacity of 28) closed during this licensing period and
is no longer part of the Vista Maria Open Residential license. The facility
submitted one acceptable corrective action plan related to an unjustified
and undocumented seclusion in Dolores Hall. The CAP was fully
implemented on 3/31/20. However, that building has since closed. The
remaining buildings on this license (DeRoy & Myriam) do not have behavior
management rooms and do not seclude youth.
There were no substantiated incidents of maltreatment in care during this
licensing period.
In 2019, the Interim Inspection found one violation of R 400.4152 (i) Initial
documentation – no documentation that the grievance policy was provided
to residents and their families. A corrective action plan was submitted and
fully implemented on 1/07/20.
IV. RECOMMENDATION
Your facility is in compliance with all applicable licensing rules, statutes, ISEP and
contracts. I recommend the facility be issued a renewal of their Regular license.
